scripts.allure:clear: npm run clear:allure && npm run clear:cypress
scripts.Phase1: npm run allure:clear && npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/phase1-spec.cy.ts --env allure=true && npm run allure:report
scripts.Phase2: npm run allure:clear && npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/phase2-spec.cy.ts --env allure=true && npm run allure:report
